column5: articlename=Wonder tales from fairy isles,: England, Cornwall, Wales, Scotland, Man and Ireland

column1: '''''Wonder Tales from Fairy Isles: England, Cornwall, Wales, Scotland, Man and Ireland''''' is a collection of poetry, published in [[1929]]. The anthology includes [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[Goblin Feet]]", differing slightly from the version published in ''[[Fifty New Poems for Children]]'' (eg., "gray" for "grey").<ref>{{webcite

column2: title=Photos of ''Wonder Tales from Fairy Isles''
